processors.name: Remove Line Headers and Trailing Pipe

labels.label: Note: Input Port to which Mahesh's processor will connect to
Note 1. This processor updates the schema name. Make sure to update the schema name here if there are changes to the schema name or a new schema needs to be used.
Note: 1. The Hortonworks schema registry needs to be started first and then the other two controller services 2. The URL for the schema may need to change once deployed to the demo environment.

entry.value: DeviceGUID, DeviceId, PatientId, PatientName, DiagnosisDescription, HealthProviderName, Location, DoctorEmail, SampleDuration, Respiration, PulseRate, BloodPressureSystolic, BloodPressureDiastolic, BodyTemperature, TransmissionTimestamp
